meanings.definition: A plant of the parsley family, with aromatic seeds and leaves.
meanings.sent1: I planted some coriander in my garden for its fragrant seeds.
meanings.sent2: The coriander plant in the backyard smells so nice.
meanings.sent3: The coriander plant whispered secrets to the parsley next to it.
meanings.sent4: The coriander plant stood tall like a guardian in the herb garden.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of coriander filled the air, making me feel calm and happy.

meanings.definition: The dried ripe fruit of the coriander plant, used as a spice.
meanings.sent1: I added a pinch of ground coriander to the curry for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The chef sprinkled coriander on top of the dish before serving it.
meanings.sent3: The coriander spice danced in the pot, adding magic to the stew.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of coriander filled the kitchen, transforming it into a cozy haven.
meanings.sent5: The taste of coriander on my tongue brought back memories of home-cooked meals.
